headline: Emerson Electric: Fiscal Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: ST. LOUIS (AP) — Emerson Electric Co. (EMR) on Tuesday reported fiscal first-quarter earnings of $605 million. The St. Louis-based company said it had net income of $1.07 per share.

headline: Emerson Reports First Quarter 2026 Results; Updates 2026 Outlook
summary: Emerson (NYSE: EMR) today reported results for its first quarter ended December 31, 2025 and updated its full year outlook for fiscal 2026. Emerson also declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.555 per share of common stock payable March 10, 2026 to stockholders of record on February 13, 2026.

headline: Emerson Electric Shareholders Reelect Directors as Board Declassification Proposal Falls Short
summary: Emerson Electric (NYSE:EMR) held its 2026 Annual Meeting of Shareholders online, outlining four voting items and briefly reviewing fiscal 2025 performance and recent portfolio actions. The meeting was chaired by Michael Tang, the company’s senior vice president, secretary, and chief legal officer.

headline: Vertiv (VRT): 3 Reasons We Love This Stock
summary: Vertiv currently trades at $191.25 and has been a dream stock for shareholders. It’s returned 852% since February 2021, blowing past the S&P 500’s 81.2% gain. The company has also beaten the index over the past six months as its stock price is up 36.4% thanks to its solid quarterly results.
